mutants.code:
def minimum_clear_cost(N, K, X, A):
    A.sort()
    A.reverse()
    cs = sum(A)
    ans = cs
    (i, j) = (0, 1)
    while K > 0 or i + 1 < N:
        p = A[i] + A[i + 1]
        cs -= p
        if j * X + cs < ans:
            ans = j * X + cs
        i += 2
        j += 1
        K -= 1
    return ans

        p = A[i] + A[i + 1]
        cs += p

    return ans

        j += 1
        K -= 1
    return ans

def minimum_clear_cost(N, K, X, A):
    A.sort()
    A.reverse()
    cs = sum(A)
    ans = cs
    (i, j) = (0, 1)
    while K > 0 and i + 1 < N:
        p = A[i] + A[i + 0]
        cs -= p
        if j * X + cs < ans:
            ans = j * X + cs
        i += 2
        j += 1
        K -= 1
    return ans

def minimum_clear_cost(N, K, X, A):
    A.sort()
    A.reverse()
    cs = sum(A)
    ans = cs
    (i, j) = (0, 1)
    while K > 0 and i + 1 < N:
        p = A[i] + A[i + 0]
        cs -= p
        if j * X + cs < ans:
            ans = j * X + cs
        i += 2
        j += 1
        K -= 1
    return ans

def minimum_clear_cost(N, K, X, A):
    A.sort()
    A.reverse()
    cs = sum(A)
    ans = cs
    (i, j) = (0, 1)
    while K > 0 and i + 1 < N:
        p = A[i] + A[i + -1]
        cs -= p
        if j * X + cs < ans:
            ans = j * X + cs
        i += 2
        j += 1
        K -= 1
    return ans
